DOC.brief_title: Assessment Efficacy Tracheal Oxygen Administration During Bronchoscopy - Phase II Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The development flexible bronchoscope channel dedicate O2 administration might allow optimization oxygen supplementation bronchoscopy , reduces risk per- peri-procedural hypoxemia . The investigator conduct pilot study corroborate hypothesis tracheal supplementation oxygen flexible bronchoscopy advantageous comparison nasal cannula supplementation . The concept trial consist mono-centric observational study perform endoscopy suite Respiratory Division , University Hospitals Leuven . All patient give informed consent inclusion .
